Class MealPlannerAddMealFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
        • com.example.snackoverflow.MealPlannerAddMealFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
    public class MealPlannerAddMealFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
implements android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
    A class modelling adding a meal to a Meal Planner extends DialogFragment implements AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
    See Also:
    MealPlannerAdapter, Mealday, MealdayAdapter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  MealPlannerAddMealFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
      interface for OnFragmentInteractionListener that implements mainly 3 function 1) adding a meal 2) deleting a meal 3) deleting the whole day (if no meals remaining on the day)
